name: Lápiz 02
description:
» Most pieces of art start with a pencil, some artists meet digital art and feel like not touching a pencil again, but holding one in our hands will always remind us of our beginnings. « 

My first NFT ever was tokenized on november 2019, it was also one of my first pieces 3D modeled, it was "Lapiz". This piece is now the second piece of a series which I decided to start today by calling it the 02.

This piece is also part of the NFTboxHen.


» 1080x1080 PNG file 1.12MB
» Made with Blender, Cycles render.
